Interface VideogameRestInterface

      • searchVideogames

        @GET(value="search?format=json&resources=game")
retrofit2.Call<VideogameSearchJSON> searchVideogames(@Query(value="query")
                                                                                                      java.lang.String query,
                                                                                                      @Query(value="limit")
                                                                                                      int maxResults,
                                                                                                      @Query(value="api_key")
                                                                                                      java.lang.String apiKey)
        Searches videogames
        Parameters:
        query - the title to search
        maxResults - max number of results
        apiKey - the service API key
        Returns:
        a search JSON representation

      • getVideogameInfo

        @GET(value="game/{gameId}/?format=json&field_list=id,original_release_date,expected_release_day,expected_release_month,expected_release_year,genres,name,deck,developers,publishers,platforms,image")
retrofit2.Call<VideogameJSON> getVideogameInfo(@Path(value="gameId")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      java.lang.String gameId,

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      java.lang.String apiKey)
